comment: Update: Definitely experienced the expected side effects of an immunization shot. Chills, low grade fever & aches at the joints which only lasted about -10 hrs start to finish. It was no worse than what I experienced when I got my flu shot. Feeling good now.
amr:

                        :ARG1-of (l / low-04)))
            :op3 (a2 / ache-01
                  :location (j / joint)
                  :duration (a3 / about

                              :unit (h / hour))
                        :mod (o / only)))
            :snt3 (b / bad-07

                                          :ARG0 ii4

                                          :ARG2 (d2 / disease
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "influenza"))))))))
      :snt4 (f2 / feel-01
            :ARG0 ii4
            :ARG1 (g3 / good-02)

comment: So far, Im only experiencing soreness at the injection site which is to be expected. I am prepared for symptoms (aches and low grade fever) similar to what one would get after getting an flu shot.
amr:
